title: Close Store and Reconcile Cash
description: A manager needs to perform the end-of-day closing procedures, including cash reconciliation.

tasks.description: Run the end-of-day process on each POS terminal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Each POS terminal is closed for the day, and sales reports are generated.

tasks.description: Count the cash from each drawer and compare it to the POS sales report.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager counts the cash and enters the totals into the reconciliation tool.

tasks.description: Investigate any variance, prepare the bank deposit, and finalize the closing report.
tasks.expected_outcome: All cash is accounted for, the deposit is prepared, and the store is officially closed for the day.
